Get the value of the clause at index Idx.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/use">Use</a> isCatch/isFilter to determine what type of clause this is.

### isCleanup() {#a136fa46d9fdd577ac5bd8f0f2d78082d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::sandboxir::LandingPadInst::isCleanup () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return &#39;true&#39; if this landingpad instruction is a cleanup.

I.e., it should be run when unwinding even if its landing pad doesn&#39;t catch the exception.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/instruction-h/#l01521">1521</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/instruction-h">Instruction.h</a>.
